sources.title: The L.A. Riot Spectacular | Full Comedy | Snoop Dog
sources.description:
**This film is under license from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved**

The L.A. Riot Spectacular - an equal opportunity offender, is a surreal, funny, and provocative view of the participants and psychology that fuelled the epochal 1992 events.

2005
Stars: Snoop Dogg, T.K. Carter, Charles S. Dutton
